resources.string: Choose a higher number. \nQuestions may be repeated until you reach 20 points.
Choose a Roman numeral that is larger. \nThe questions may be repeated until you reach 20 points.

"Congratulations, level passed!\n Did you know that the number 7 is considered the luckiest number? There are 7 days a week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes, 7 days of Creation and much more. Also the number 7 is most often the favorite number of people all over the world."
"Congratulations, level passed! \n Did you know there is no 0 in Roman numerals? "
Which animal shows the tongue more?
Congratulations, level passed! \n Did you know that a woodpecker, when it strikes a tree with its beak, draws in its tongue and wraps around its brain to protect it?
Choose something edible. \nQuestions may be repeated until you reach 20 points.
Congratulations, level passed! \n Many crocodiles are known to swallow stones. But not because they are edible for them. The stones help them sink into the water faster and stay at the bottom.
"Congratulations, level passed! \n Did you know that large ears help elephant regulate temperature because it can't sweat. "
